item.title: Getting started with uml
item.description: Talking UML # UML is a language. That means it has words and a syntax how to group the words of the language in order to make sentences, paragraphs and finally articles and essays. Like with human languages you can construct anything from blurb to artistic works. And unlike in human languages you use graphical elements like rectangles, ellipses, edges and the like rather than pure alphabet and sentence marks. Learning UML is like learning a foreign language.
